name: Traffio
description:
The game has been made using (Unreal Engine 5) in just less than 3 days.
Inside the game, you have multiple cars and your job is to make them rich in their home without making any accidents.
You play as a (Traffic Police Man), and there are some traffic lights that you can turn ON and OFF.

Everything you see in-game is original and made in just 3 days, except (Post Process and Trees) cuz I made them a long time ago : )
